attributes.action: Publically visit members of the armed forces who are in UK hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The PM seems to find time to swan around with the Bee-Gees on his holidays. 

Perhaps he should visit members of the armed forces in the 'spare time'he seems to have found in the various UK hospitals that they have been placed in instead of collecting anecdoctes for his memoires.
